   if (newValue === '') {
      return;
   }
	g_form.getReference('requested_for',fillLocation);
}
function fillLocation(caller){
		g_form.setValue('location',caller.location);
		g_form.setValue('origin',caller.location);
	}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>thomas.rogienski</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-29 22:43:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>fbe2ee26dbfc20102e98dde74896191c</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6f71f10b2f196010ad6059a72799b651</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Autofill Location</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6f71f10b2f196010ad6059a72799b651</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>thomas.rogienski</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-30 15:39:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	if(g_form.getValue('shipping_type')=='domestic'){
		g_form.getReference('location',fillCountry);
	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below   
}
function fillCountry(caller){
	g_form.setValue('country',caller.country);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>thomas.rogienski</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-30 16:39:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>fbe2ee26dbfc20102e98dde74896191c</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>10a86dd32f512010ad6059a72799b631</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Correct the country field</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_10a86dd32f512010ad6059a72799b631</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>thomas.rogienski</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-30 16:45:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="fbe2ee26dbfc20102e98dde74896191c" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Shipping Request">e128b1f62f9d2010ad6059a72799b620</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:a45154c72f156010ad6059a72799b6a0</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Fill Country with User's location</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	if(newValue=='domestic'){
		g_form.getReference('location',fillCountry);
	} 
}
function fillCountry(caller){
	g_form.setValue('country',caller.country);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>thomas.rogienski</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-30 16:25:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>fbe2ee26dbfc20102e98dde74896191c</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e174e5532f512010ad6059a72799b69f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fill Country with User's location</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e174e5532f512010ad6059a72799b69f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>thomas.rogienski</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-30 16:25:21</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
